name: Puzzle Wars: Heroes
description:
Welcome to the “Puzzle Wars:Heroes” world!

Collect your deck with unique heroes and start to win!

If you like match 3 games and want to fight with real players - you are in the right place - Puzzle Wars: Heroes is waiting for you!
*Simple and clear combat mechanics - match chips on the battlefield and summon your heroes.
*A lot of different heroes will allow you to collect your own deck and play exactly as you want.
*Each hero has his own unique ability, which, can turn the tide of the battle.
*Win and become stronger - super simple, super engaging.

Puzzle Wars: Heroes is the match 3 we deserve! No more talks - forward to the battle!
